title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 317 - Labeling, Marking Devices And Containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 317 - Labeling, Marking Devices And Containers

State Regulations
§ 317.1 - Labels required; supervision by department employee
§ 317.2 - Labels: definition; required features
§ 317.3 - Approval of abbreviations of marks of inspection; preparation of marking devices bearing inspection legend without advance approval prohibited; exception
§ 317.4 - Labels to be approved by the commissioner
§ 317.5 - Officer in charge may permit modifications of approved labels
§ 317.6 - Approved labels to be used only on products to which they are applicable
§ 317.8 - False or misleading labeling or practices generally; specific prohibitions and requirements for labels and containers
§ 317.9 - Labeling of equine products
§ 317.10 - Reuse of official inspection marks; reuse of containers bearing official marks, labels, etc
§ 317.11 - Labeling, filling of containers, handling of labeled products to be only in compliance with regualtions
§ 317.12 - Relabeling products; requirements
§ 317.13 - Storage and distribution of labels and containers bearing official marks
§ 317.14 - Reporting of obsolete labels
§ 317.16 - Labeling and containers of custom prepared products
§ 317.17 - Interpretation and statement of labeling policy for cured products
§ 317.19 - Jar closure requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 317

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §96-s

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
